channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

item.title: Water flowing in street, 17th July
item.description:
This flowing water has been happening for at least the last 2 months. A hazard to the public especially the elderly

item.title: 77 Great titchfield street w1. Missed collection again, 17th July
item.description:

item.title: Benches covered in bird dropping, 17th July
item.description:
Pembroke/ widmore Park at end of Lewis Road. There are a couple of park benches that need a good clean. I know that they are under trees and the birds like to ' aim ' at something.There are only 2 benches to sit at but they are quite disgusting and put people off from enjoying the outdoors.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lewes Road, Widmore, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Patten House door does not work properly., 17th July
item.description:
The fob key does not open the main door and the buzzer works to communicate only. Residents of the building were stuck outside after coming home from work yesterday until someone from inside the flats came down to open it. Please fix it. Thank you.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Green Lanes, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dump of fly-tipping, 17th July
item.description:
Residents are continuously dumping rubbish near the alleyway. There are rubbish sacks, bulky items and it is piling up. The resident at no.3 reports that this is very unsanitary and it is happening too many times. Please clear ASAP.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Clapton Passage, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Conway works obstructing pavement, 17th July
item.description:
Conway have closed walkway outside No 57 under permit no 2047132. Start date 7 /7/25 for 3 days, ie until 10/7/25 Work completed over a week ago and footway still closed, 7 days after permit end date.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Woodwarde Road, Dulwich Village, London
Report on FixMyStreet
